participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and playful, enjoys socializing but often gets lost in her hobbies.
participant_1.background: i live in a house. i have a boyfriend. i don't drink soda. i like to take walks. i like to eat hamburgers and french fries.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and adventurous, always looking for new experiences and loves gaming.
participant_2.background: my dream in life is to work from home. i dye my hair every three months. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it. i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games.
